thread.title: Kannada industry mourns for Manorama
thread.title_full: Kannada industry mourns for Manorama - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Kannada industry mourns for Manorama
text:
Legendary actress Manorama, who has been a part of close to 1500 films through her career spanning five decades, passed away last night at the age of 78. The actress was ill for a while before she breathed her last. While she has been part of mostly Tamil films, she has graced the Kannada screen as well as Hindi too. Celebrities from the Kannada film industry took to their micro blogging sites to convey their condolences. She will be greatly missed
MANORAMA'S KANNADA FILMS
* Preethiye Nanna Daiva (1991) * Premanubandha (1981) * Devara Duddu (1977) * Geddavalu Nane (1977) * Devara Gudi (1975) * Ninagagi Naanu (1975)
